Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 55th overall pick, by Troy in 1972...
Injured on 7/24/1976 with a Inflamed Hamstring Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/17/1978, off Matt Corr (CI)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/12/1978, off Ronnie Swiderski (CC)...
Signed as a free agent by Capital City on 2/1/1984 to a 4-year deal worth $1,004,400 per year...
Traded from Capital City to Bay City on 4/12/1985 (Going to CC: SS F. Player. Going to BC: LF O. Rodriguez, P J. Green)...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Manchester on 6/3/1985...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Leftfield in 1985...
